mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_checkitem_answer(stage_rel_id, checkitem_id, first_check_verify_result, first_check_verify_text_value, first_check_verify_number_value, first_check_verify_image_id, first_check_verify_video_id, first_check_verify_file_id, first_check_remark, first_check_operator, second_check_verify_result, second_check_verify_text_value, second_check_verify_number_value, second_check_verify_image_id, second_check_verify_video_id, second_check_verify_file_id, second_check_remark, second_check_operator, third_check_verify_result, third_check_verify_text_value, third_check_verify_number_value, third_check_verify_image_id, third_check_verify_video_id, third_check_verify_file_id, third_check_remark, third_check_operator, created_at) VALUES (#{item.stageRelId}, #{item.checkItemId}, #{item.firstCheckVerifyResult}, #{item.firstCheckVerifyTextValue}, #{item.firstCheckVerifyNumberValue}, #{item.firstCheckVerifyImageId}, #{item.firstCheckVerifyVideoId}, #{item.firstCheckVerifyFileId}, #{item.firstCheckRemark}, #{item.firstCheckOperator}, #{item.secondCheckVerifyResult}, #{item.secondCheckVerifyTextValue}, #{item.secondCheckVerifyNumberValue}, #{item.secondCheckVerifyImageId}, #{item.secondCheckVerifyVideoId}, #{item.secondCheckVerifyFileId}, #{item.secondCheckRemark}, #{item.secondCheckOperator}, #{item.thirdCheckVerifyResult}, #{item.thirdCheckVerifyTextValue}, #{item.thirdCheckVerifyNumberValue}, #{item.thirdCheckVerifyImageId}, #{item.thirdCheckVerifyVideoId}, #{item.thirdCheckVerifyFileId}, #{item.thirdCheckRemark}, #{item.thirdCheckOperator}, NOW())
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_checkitem_answer
first_check_verify_result = #{item.firstCheckVerifyResult},
first_check_verify_text_value = #{item.firstCheckVerifyTextValue},
first_check_verify_number_value = #{item.firstCheckVerifyNumberValue},
first_check_verify_image_id = #{item.firstCheckVerifyImageId},
first_check_verify_video_id = #{item.firstCheckVerifyVideoId},
first_check_verify_file_id = #{item.firstCheckVerifyFileId},
first_check_remark = #{item.firstCheckRemark},
first_check_operator = #{item.firstCheckOperator},
second_check_verify_result = #{item.secondCheckVerifyResult},
second_check_verify_text_value = #{item.secondCheckVerifyTextValue},
second_check_verify_number_value = #{item.secondCheckVerifyNumberValue},
second_check_verify_image_id = #{item.secondCheckVerifyImageId},
second_check_verify_video_id = #{item.secondCheckVerifyVideoId},
second_check_verify_file_id = #{item.secondCheckVerifyFileId},
second_check_remark = #{item.secondCheckRemark},
second_check_operator = #{item.secondCheckOperator},
third_check_verify_result = #{item.thirdCheckVerifyResult},
third_check_verify_text_value = #{item.thirdCheckVerifyTextValue},
third_check_verify_number_value = #{item.thirdCheckVerifyNumberValue},
third_check_verify_image_id = #{item.thirdCheckVerifyImageId},
third_check_verify_video_id = #{item.thirdCheckVerifyVideoId},
third_check_verify_file_id = #{item.thirdCheckVerifyFileId},
third_check_remark = #{item.thirdCheckRemark},
third_check_operator = #{item.thirdCheckOperator},
updated_at = NOW()
WHERE stage_rel_id = #{item.stageRelId} AND checkitem_id = #{item.checkItemId}
